code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import html2pdf from"html2pdf.js";import'./pdf.css';import ima from'./images/dummy.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pdf=props=>{const contentRef=useRef();const handleback=()=>{props.setoption(0);};const handlestate=()=>{props.setoption(1);};const exportHTMLtoPDF=()=>{const element=contentRef.current;const imgElement=element.querySelector('img');const opt={margin:1,filename:'exported_file.pdf',image:{type:'jpeg',quality:0.98},html2canvas:{scale:2,backgroundColor:'#000000'},jsPDF:{unit:'mm',backgroundColor:'#000000',format:[100,200],orientation:'portrait'}};if(imgElement.complete){html2pdf().from(element).set(opt).save('exported_file.pdf');}else{imgElement.onload=()=>{html2pdf().from(element).set(opt).save('exported_file.pdf');};}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:contentRef,className:"main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img",src:props.imgaddress})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exportbtn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlestate,className:"butt",children:"Back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleback,className:"butt",children:"Scan Again"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:exportHTMLtoPDF,className:"butt",children:"Export to PDF"})]})]});};export default Pdf;
